name: CreateSalesforceOpportunity
description: Creates a new Opportunity in Salesforce CRM. Provide name, stage name, and close date.

stageName.description: Stage of the opportunity (e.g., Prospecting, Qualification, Needs Analysis, Value Proposition, Id. Decision Makers, Perception Analysis, Proposal/Price Quote, Negotiation/Review, Closed Won, Closed Lost)

closeDate.description: Expected close date in YYYY-MM-DD format

name: GetSalesforceOpportunities
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Opportunities, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of opportunities to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceOpportunity
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Opportunity. You must provide the opportunity ID and at least one field to update.

accountId.description: Salesforce Account ID to associate with this opportunity

name: DeleteSalesforceOpportunity
description: Deletes a Salesforce Opportunity using its unique Opportunity ID.

name: CreateSalesforceLead
description: Creates a new Lead in Salesforce CRM. Provide first name, last name, and company.

name: GetSalesforceLeads
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Leads, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of leads to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceLead
description: Finds a Salesforce lead by Lead ID or by name (full name or first/last name), then updates the specified fields.

name.description: Full name of the lead to find if Lead ID is not provided.

firstName.description: Lead's first name. Used for finding or updating the lead.

lastName.description: Lead's last name. Used for finding or updating the lead.

leadSource.description: Source from which the lead was acquired.

name: DeleteSalesforceLead
description: Deletes a Salesforce Lead by Lead ID or by searching for the lead using full name, first name, or last name.

leadId.description: The Salesforce Lead ID to delete. Optional if name or first/last name is provided.

name.description: Full name of the lead to find if Lead ID is not provided.

firstName.description: Lead's first name. Used for finding the lead if Lead ID is not provided.

lastName.description: Lead's last name. Used for finding the lead if Lead ID is not provided.

name: CreateSalesforceTask
description: Creates a new Task in Salesforce CRM. Provide subject and optionally status.

status.description: Task status (e.g., Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Waiting on someone else, Deferred)

name: GetSalesforceTasks
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Tasks, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of tasks to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceTask
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Task. You must provide the task ID and at least one field to update.

name: DeleteSalesforceTask
description: Deletes a Salesforce Task using its unique Task ID.

name: CreateSalesforceAccount
description: Creates a new Account in Salesforce CRM. Provide account name.

name: GetSalesforceAccounts
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Accounts, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of accounts to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceAccount
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Account. You must provide the account ID and at least one field to update.

type.description: Account type (e.g., Customer - Direct, Customer - Channel, Channel Partner / Reseller, Installation Partner, Technology Partner, Other)

name: DeleteSalesforceAccount
description: Deletes a Salesforce Account using its unique Account ID.

name: CreateSalesforceContact
description: Creates a new Contact in Salesforce CRM. Provide first name and last name.

name: GetSalesforceContacts
description: Retrieves a list of Salesforce Contacts, ordered by most recent created date.

limit.description: Number of contacts to retrieve (default: 20, max: 200).

name: UpdateSalesforceContact
description: Updates any fields of a Salesforce Contact. You must provide the contact ID and at least one field to update.

accountId.description: Salesforce Account ID to associate with this contact

name: DeleteSalesforceContact
description: Deletes a Salesforce Contact using its unique Contact ID.
